text: @realDonaldTrump @POTUS @SecretarySonny @ZippyDuvall I know this probably won't be seen, not at least by any one that matters, but I wish to urge you, Mr. Trump, to please inform the public of the danger that Covid-19 is actually presenting towards our younger people..
